articles.title: Spark Networks Launches Major Technology Platform Overhaul for EliteSingles, SilverSingles, Christian Mingle and Jdate (Spark Networks SE)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Spark Networks introduced its new platform, expanded offerings, and modernized rebranding as part of a multi-year strategy to enhance user experience and strengthen its position in online dating. This transformation aims to revolutionize how the company connects people.

articles.title: Navigating the Impact of Overinvolved Parenting in College Life
articles.summary: The article features various news services, including a news subscription service, world news translation services, and celebrity, sports, entertainment, and daily news updates. Additionally, the article mentions online courses on technology, health insurance plans, tech gadgets and accessories, best video game consoles and games which can be launched or updated as new products or services.

articles.title: New-Stuff Alert: Aritzia Nikes and Cheaper Augustinus Bader
articles.author: Liza Corsillo
articles.summary: Aritzia and Nike have collaborated on mocha-brown sneakers. Augustinus Bader launched a new, more affordable skin-care line called Dua in collaboration with Dua Lipa, which includes firming serum, cleanser and daily moisturizer. Cob, co-founded by Novak Djokovic, introduced popped sorghum as a healthier snack alternative to popcorn. Louis Poulsen released Rumee, a portable mushroom table lamp, while Hess launched two pull-back race cars. Caran d'Ache added Alpine blue and Alpine white to its neon ballpoint pen line. Helinox unveiled TERG, a line of technical bags, and Armitron launched a Peanuts collection of watches, while Loll Designs released indoor-outdoor, flat-packable winter and holiday décor.

articles.title: 33 Mundane But Useful Products If You're Living Alone
articles.author: Divinia Tarin
articles.summary: The article highlights several new products designed to simplify household tasks.  The SwitchBot Smart Switch Button Pusher automates one-way buttons, while the Dash mini rice cooker efficiently cooks various dishes.  The Mr. Coffee coffee maker offers multiple drink options with a built-in frother, targeting convenient at-home beverage preparation.

articles.title: Xiaomi 17 Pro Max: E get mind with double display, but wetin e fit do?
articles.author: Amina Nasir
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched the 17 Pro Max phone, featuring dual LTPO OLED displays and a 7,500 mAh battery. The phone is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and supports 100W charging, filling the battery in approximately 39 minutes.

articles.title: The Honda Prelude's Hybrid Engine Means It'll Never Have A Manual Transmission
articles.author: Chase Bierenkoven
articles.summary: Honda is introducing the new Prelude, a hybrid coupe equipped with an automatic transmission and a new S+ Shift mode designed to simulate a manual transmission experience with paddle shifters and imitation engine sounds. The Honda Prelude model has already sold out in Japan.

articles.title: Nectar Mattress Sale November 2025: Shop Early Black Friday Deals
articles.author: Maya Gandara
articles.summary: Nectar revamped its mattress lineup in 2025, including models like the Classic, Premier, Luxe, and Ultra, with slight price increases and updated designs. Current discounts are available on these revamped mattresses, with offers on memory foam and hybrid versions featuring enhanced cooling, support, and pressure relief. Specific models like the Nectar Premier, known for its moisture-wicking cover, and Luxe Hybrid, with better edge support, are highlighted with their unique features and available discounts.

articles.title: Starbucks holiday menu items showcasing coffee chain's festive flair
articles.author: Ian Shantz
articles.summary: Starbucks Canada launched its seasonal lineup, featuring returning favorites like Peppermint Mocha and Caramel Brulé Latte, and new items such as the Iced Gingerbread Oat Chai and Polar Bear Cake Pop. New holiday cups inspired by Starbucks baristas' aprons and merchandise like the 'Bearista' cold cup are also being introduced.

articles.title: Jambalaya Marketing Introduces 'AI Search Optimization' Program to Equip Businesses for the Era of Intelligent Search
org: The Foundation of AI Search Optimization
articles.summary: Jambalaya Marketing has launched its AI Search Optimization (AISO) program to help businesses establish credibility and digital authority within the AI-driven search platforms. The AISO program focuses on authority building, entity optimization, AI content engineering, and reputation mapping to improve online rankings and future-proof relevance in an AI-governed search environment.

articles.title: Ketel One Vodka Fans Are Calling Its Newest Release a 'Must Buy'
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Reviewers are praising a new item for not being 'too sweet' and for 'not disappointing,' indicating a positive reception and successful launch of a potentially new food or beverage product.

articles.title: Video: Yesterdays Results Were Rock Solid!
articles.author: Adam Kinzinger
articles.summary: Wear Them Out Products is being promoted, inviting people to check out their products or services. The promotion occurred after an event in San Francisco.

articles.title: This budget robot vacuum nails the basics
articles.author: Steve Hogarty
articles.summary: iRobot launched the Roomba combo 105, a cheaper robot vacuum, which offers powerful suction and a basic mopping function. The Roomba combo 105 uses a LiDAR system for navigation but lacks advanced object avoidance and is suitable for clutter-free homes with mainly hard floors.

articles.title: TECNO SPARK Slim And Megapad Pro Arrives With Style, Smarts, And Strength – Now Open For Pre-Order
articles.author: Leadership News
articles.summary: TECNO is launching the SPARK Slim, the world's slimmest 3D curved AI smartphone, and the MEGAPAD SE/Pro tablet. Pre-orders are open from November 5 to 14, 2025, with incentives including a free headset for Spark Slim pre-orders and a free keypad for MEGAPAD SE/Pro pre-orders, available while stocks last. Pickup will be available at selected TECNO stores nationwide after the official launch on November 15th.

articles.title: OpenAI's AI Video App Sora Launches on Android: Revolutionizing Video Creation with Advanced AI Technology
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: OpenAI launched its AI video generation model, Sora, on Android devices, which was previously limited to research previews and select users. The Android version is optimized for mobile use and allows users to generate high-quality videos from simple text prompts. It has features like optimized interface, cloud-based processing, prompt library and social media sharing integration.

articles.title: ‘I've tried every high-end dry shampoo and this is hands-down the best'
articles.author: Bethan Shufflebotham
articles.summary: Color Wow has launched its Insta-WOW Advanced Dry Shampoo, designed to clean like a real shampoo using Active Cleansing Technology. The \u00a326.50 formula removes up to 95% of sebum, promising virtually no residue and a floral scent, with positive customer reviews noting its effectiveness in absorbing oil and refreshing hair.

articles.title: iTWire - Innovative Printing Solutions: Empowering Tech Brands in a Digital World
articles.author: Guest Writer
articles.summary: Tech companies are increasingly utilizing advanced printing solutions for purposes such as branding, prototyping, and streamlining workflows. Examples include SaaS providers using interactive brochures with NFC chips to drive digital adoption and hardware startups employing large-format printers for lead generation at trade shows. 3D printing integration also allows developers to quickly prototype hardware casings from CAD files.

articles.title: AI Search Intelligence Platform Akii Partners With UAE Agency Brendit to Expand Markets
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Akii, a U.S.-based AI Search Intelligence platform, has partnered with Brendit, a UAE-based marketing agency, to bring AI Visibility Optimization technology to Brendit's clients.  Brendit will integrate Akii's platform, including tools like the AI Visibility Score and Website Optimizer, into its services, enabling brands to improve their visibility and authority across AI search engines like ChatGPT and Gemini. This partnership expands access to Akii's AI visibility technology and introduces a new service offering for Brendit's clients.

articles.title: Tesla sales in Germany have cratered from last year, data shows
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Tesla introduced a new, lower-cost version of its Model Y SUV in Germany during October.

articles.title: I Let Gemini Access My Gmail, and It's Downright Creepy
articles.author: PC Mag
articles.summary: ace.me is introducing a unified platform as an alternative to Linktree, Gmail, and Dropbox. This new product combines a website builder, email address service, and cloud storage focused on privacy. The company encourages users to claim short, memorable tags.

articles.title: This AI ring takes notes for you and even talks back - in your own voice
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Sandbar's Stream Ring offers specific functionalities. Information is provided on how customers can acquire the Stream Ring.

articles.title: The Ninja PossibleCooker Is Basically Eight Appliances in One-And It's on Sale for Over 40% Off
articles.author: Kayleigh Drake
articles.summary: Ninja is offering the Foodi PossibleCooker, a multipurpose appliance that functions as eight appliances in one, including a slow cooker, sous vide, steamer, and oven. The PossibleCooker has an 8.5-quart capacity, comes with a multipurpose utensil and recipe booklet, and is currently on sale for 41% off on Amazon.

articles.title: Utah-based soda shop coming to busy Meridian corridor
articles.author: Sydney Kidd
articles.summary: Swig is planning a new 900-square-foot location on Ten Mile Rd. near the I-84 interchange in Meridian. The soda shop will feature a small parking lot and a drive-thru lane, offering its signature 'dirty sodas,' hot chocolates, blended drinks, cookies, and treats.

articles.title: The Body Shop's advent calendar has landed - packed with impressive treats and still one of the most affordable options this year
articles.author: PHOEBE DAVENPORT
articles.summary: The Body Shop launched its 2025 Classic Beauty Advent Calendar, packed with 24 of The Body Shop's bestselling products like shower gels, face masks, and lip butters.  The advent calendar is valued at £127.50 but is selling for £60, offering a significant discount and a chance to try various travel-sized products.

articles.title: Coke's AI Ad Isn't Just Marketing. It's Corporate Communications.
articles.author: Shann Biglione
articles.summary: Coca-Cola launched a new AI-produced Christmas ad featuring polar bears and Santa Claus. The company accompanied the launch with a press rollout and executive quotes. The AI-powered commercial aims to reassure investors about Coca-Cola's adaptability and future readiness in the age of data and automation.

articles.title: How popular was the return of McDonald's Snack Wraps?
articles.author: Michelle Del Rey
articles.summary: McDonald's launched the Snack Wrap, describing it as the "most popular new chicken product launch in the U.S. in recent history."

articles.title: Taco Bell Just Launched a New Dessert Item – People Think It Belongs in a Soap Aisle
articles.author: Moupriya
articles.summary: Taco Bell introduced the Baja Blast Pie, inspired by Mountain Dew's Baja Blast flavor, as a limited-time dessert item.  The pie features a creamy, key-lime-style filling and graham cracker crust, but initial reviews from TikTok users and food critics are mixed regarding its taste and appearance.

articles.title: Bad Hair Day Leads to Vending Machine for Women of Color on Rutgers-Newark Campus
articles.author: Andrea Barbaran
articles.summary: Tanaja Hill launched 'Black Girl Beauty Supply' in February 2024, featuring a beauty supply vending machine at Rutgers University-Newark. The machine offers beauty essentials, including Mielle Organics and Shea Moisture products. Hill plans to expand the business to other Rutgers campuses and internationally.

articles.title: Conquer Mobile Gaming With Lenovo's Legion Tab Gen 3, Now Down to $370
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: An Android mobile gaming tablet is being offered at a discounted price.

articles.title: Local Tree Service Marketing's Julian Awad to Speak at TCI Expo 2025 Conference
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Local Tree Service Marketing, an AI-powered digital marketing agency, offers SEO, paid advertising, and lead generation services for tree care companies. Julian Awad, President of Local Tree Service Marketing, is presenting at TCI Expo 2025 on adapting marketing strategies to Google's AI updates, emphasizing digital trust and relevance for online visibility.

articles.title: Entertainment: One Love Festival this weekend, Netflix welcomes Sesame Street
articles.summary: Netflix previewed its upcoming re-imagined "Sesame Street." This signals a potential update or new offering on the streaming platform.

articles.title: All the brains, and none of the bloat!
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Google offers a flagship product that features clean Android, clever AI, and versatile cameras.

articles.title: IE Bath & Body Works Opens With 'Scent Bar,' New Layout, Upgraded Shopping Space
articles.author: Ashley Ludwig
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works is opening a new store featuring the Gingham+ format. Gingham+ incorporates elevated design elements, technology features, a more open floor plan, and redesigned fixtures to deliver a seamless in-store customer shopping experience. The new design includes specific destinations in store to test products and softer color palette.

articles.title: The PlayStation Portal is still flawed, but I've learned to love it as a new dad
articles.author: Jeff Dunn
articles.summary: The PlayStation Portal, a handheld device by Sony, allows users to stream games from their PlayStation 5 console. It features controls similar to a regular PS5 controller and an 8-inch LCD screen. While it requires a stable Wi-Fi connection and is not ideal for all game types, it allows gamers to play PlayStation games in short bursts.

articles.title: Refy Made A Lipstick For People Who Hate Lipstick
articles.author: Emma Stout
articles.summary: Refy has launched a new product called Lip Stick, a hydrating lipstick with buildable color. This product distinguishes itself with a metal rollerball applicator, vitamin E-infused formula, and a satin finish. The Lip Stick simplifies traditional lip routines by offering effortless color and blending.

articles.title: Luxury Home Textile Store Opening Its First MA Spot In Chestnut Hill
articles.author: Benjamin Pierce
articles.summary: Boll and Branch, a luxury home textile company specializing in 100% organic cotton bedding, bath, and home products, is opening its first Massachusetts location at The Street Chestnut Hill early next year. This marks an expansion from their online business and existing physical locations in other states.

articles.title: Wavytalk Expands with Target.com Debut and Exclusive In-Store Launch This Holiday Season
articles.author: Wavytalk
articles.summary: Wavytalk launched its haircare products, including Blowout Boost, Steamline Pro, Whirlwind Pro, Heatwave Pro, Blown Away, and Airsculpt 5-in-1, on Target.com and in Target stores nationwide. The launch includes an exclusive holiday bundle of the Blowout Boost in Target stores.

articles.title: Beyond clean, gentle care
articles.author: --Ppa-Color-Scheme
articles.summary: TCL has launched the TCL Super Drum C682 washing machine, designed for intelligent and healthy laundry. The machine features a large drum, automatic stain removal, precise dosing, WiFi control, steam cleaning, and JetBubble technology. The Super Drum C682 also boasts Dynamic Rinse, ActiveFresh, and Smart Control via the TCL Home App.

articles.title: Yeah! Launches an Exciting Trio of Fruit-Infused Milk Flavoured Drinks
articles.author: Sponsored Post
articles.summary: The Yeah brand has introduced three new milk yoghurt drink flavors: Yeah Apple Flavoured Milk Drink, Yeah Pineapple Flavoured Milk Drink, and Yeah Orange Flavoured Milk Drink. These drinks are now available nationwide in major supermarkets and convenience stores.

articles.title: AI Friend doesn't combat loneliness—it exploits it
articles.author: Strategic Intelligence
articles.summary: Friend, a tech start-up founded by Avi Schiffman, has launched an AI companion in the form of a pendant. The device, marketed as a "Friend," allows wearers to chat via microphone but responds only through a text-based app. The AI pendant is designed to combat loneliness, but has received some backlash.

articles.title: Slim, smart, and strong: TECNO's SPARK Slim delivers affordable luxury for a new generation
articles.author: thecableng
articles.summary: TECNO is launching the SPARK Slim, the world's slimmest smartphone with a 3D curved AI screen, 50MP AI camera, and intelligent features.  The company is also releasing the MEGAPAD SE/Pro, a versatile device designed for professionals and students. Pre-orders are available from November 5-14, 2025, with free gifts offered for pre-order customers, and pickup starts after the official launch on November 15th at selected TECNO stores.

articles.title: This vape could change the weed game forever
articles.author: Rachelle Gordon
articles.summary: Active has launched Singular, a modular vape system compatible with various cannabis oils. This system features interchangeable pods with different heating elements and allows brands to customize the hardware with logos and add-ons. The reusable battery system aims to reduce electronic waste and create a universal vape market.

articles.title: Leopold Rupp works as a doctor despite his short stature and wheelchair
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: SHZ.de has launched a trial offering full access to its articles and a dedicated news app for 99 cents for the first month, aiming to attract digital readers. SHZ.de is also promoting an annual subscription option, priced at €2.75 per week, to convert trial users to longer-term subscribers.

articles.title: SKYX Announces it will be Launching a New AI Driven Software for its E-commerce Platform of 60 ...
articles.author: SKYX Platforms Corp.
articles.summary: SKYX is developing an AI-driven e-commerce platform to enhance B2B and B2C experiences with its smart product line. The company intends to use the new AI software to support its builder and pro segments and grow its builder segment through direct sales channels.

articles.title: New Era of Integrative AI: Built for Humans Delivering Outcomes
articles.author: Kochava
articles.summary: Kochava launched StationOne, a universal integrative AI client that connects Model Context Protocols (MCPs) and AdCPs with any large language model. StationOne is a centralized platform that integrates AI with existing tools while adhering to strict privacy and data protection standards, offering control, privacy, and security. Kochava focuses on quality, performance, and verifiable interoperability.

articles.title: New Era of Integrative AI: Built for Humans Delivering Outcomes
articles.author: Kochava
articles.summary: Kochava launched StationOne, a universal integrative AI client. StationOne enables marketing professionals to connect Model Context Protocols (MCPs) and AdCPs with large language models. It acts as a centralized platform that integrates AI with existing tools while ensuring privacy and data protection.

articles.title: These Boutique-Worthy Hand Soaps Make For Impressive But Highly Practical Gifts
articles.summary: Clark Family Farms offers small-batch goat's milk soap, while Aesop's hand soap is known for its mandarin rind, rosemary leaf, and lavender scent. Mrs. Meyer's releases limited-edition seasonal scents, and Hotel Lobby provides a five-star hotel hand wash with amber and vanilla notes.

articles.title: 36 Newer, Practical Gifts They Don't Have Yet
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article showcases several newly launched or updated products, including Laneige's Strawberry Shortcake Sleeping Mask featuring a dessert-inspired variation for lip care and Touchland's special edition Confetti Cake Power Mist hydrating hand sanitizer with a sparkly case. Additionally, Prepara offers a newly updated Salad Pod designed for convenient meal prep, and Kitsch introduces new Star Wars satin heatless curlers for effortless curls.

articles.title: I've tried tons of new lip products, these are my top picks for brown skin
articles.author: Sidra Sheikh
articles.summary: The article highlights several top lip product picks, including MERIT Shade Slick Hydrating Tinted Lip Oil in Sangria known for its burnt orange hue, Glow Recipe Glass Balm Lip Treatment for Shine & Hydration in Blackberry Bingsoo, targeting fine lines, NYX Professional Makeup Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Stain in Bubblegum Burst, a mix of pink and red berry stain, Jason Wu, So Pretty, pH Adjusting Lip & Cheek Tint, reacting to individual pH, Charlotte Tilbury Big Lip Plumpgasm Plumping Lip Gloss in Medium/Deep, Rhode Peptide Lip Tint Nourishing Glaze in Raspberry Jelly for lip feel, and Clinique Almost Lipstick in Black Honey, a cult classic.

articles.title: Launch Marketing Unveils Free Marketing Audit Tool to Help Businesses Identify Growth Blockers
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Launch Marketing has introduced a new 'automated marketing audit' tool, a free online assessment designed for small to mid-sized B2B businesses. This tool evaluates marketing effectiveness through five key questions, providing an instant score and personalized recommendations to improve marketing performance.

articles.title: The Era of 'Full-Chain Solo Creation' Begins: iMini AI Launches E-commerce Feature Page to Empower Online Sellers
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: iMini AI has launched its E-commerce Feature Page, a platform that uses AI to help online sellers create visual content more efficiently. The platform offers features like intelligent image generation, multi-style derivation, and dynamic video creation, aiming to reduce content production costs and accelerate digital transformation for e-commerce businesses.

articles.title: Launch Marketing Unveils Free Marketing Audit Tool to Help Businesses Identify Growth Blockers
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Launch Marketing has released a new, free online marketing assessment tool designed to help small to mid-sized businesses evaluate their B2B marketing efforts. The tool assesses key areas like messaging clarity, content effectiveness, and lead generation impact, providing users with an instant score and personalized recommendations. It aims to give leaders in marketing, sales, or growth roles quick insights to guide strategy.

articles.title: Launch Marketing Unveils Free Marketing Audit Tool to Help Businesses Identify Growth Blockers
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Launch Marketing has launched a new automated marketing audit, a free online assessment tool designed to help B2B businesses evaluate their marketing effectiveness and identify areas for improvement. The tool consists of five questions assessing messaging clarity, content effectiveness, lead generation impact, and digital strategy performance, providing an instant score and prioritized recommendations.

articles.title: Fishing boat takes on unusual advertising role
articles.summary: Cirkus advertising agency created a campaign for Milt liquid detergent by mounting an LED screen on a fishing boat. The campaign aimed to connect the brand with nature and highlight its freshness. Milt detergent was initially launched by Frigg Soapworks in 1986 targeting people with sensitive skin.

articles.title: Bruichladdich Debuts New Limited-Edition Rye Whisky, The Laddie Rye
articles.author: Bruichladdich Distillery
articles.summary: Bruichladdich Distillery launched The Laddie Rye, a new and limited-edition rye whisky. This product is exclusively available in the United States.

articles.title: Nebius takes on Microsoft and AWS with new open-model AI platform: All you need to know
articles.author: Aman Gupta
articles.summary: Nebius launched Token Factory, a new AI cloud platform designed to deploy and optimize open-source and custom models at scale. The platform supports major open models and offers options for customers to host their own models. Current Nebius AI users will automatically be upgraded to Token Factory.

articles.title: Zuper Launches the First AI-Powered Smart Glasses Built for the Skilled Trades
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Zuper has launched Zuper Glass, AI-powered smart glasses designed for skilled trades like roofing, HVAC, electrical, and plumbing. The glasses combine voice-activated operation, real-time connectivity, and AI to help field teams capture data, perform inspections, and communicate efficiently. Key benefits include voice-activated control, AI-powered intelligence, real-time sync with the Zuper platform, rugged design, and a Clarity-Assist camera.

articles.title: Zuper Launches the First AI-Powered Smart Glasses Built for the Skilled Trades
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Zuper, a field service management software provider, has launched Zuper Glass. Zuper Glass is the first AI-powered smart glasses built for the skilled trades.

articles.title: 20 Whimsical Products If You Appreciate A Little Fun With Your Functional
articles.author: Divinia Tarin
articles.summary: Acoustic frog speakers, mushroom glass vases, smiley face slippers, TonyMoly lip melt, and handheld duck vacuums are among the newly introduced products. Also available are vintage wall sconces, passionfruit dishes, sardine-themed bags, and Mjolnir meat tenderizers. Other items include croc-shaped food choppers, banana pudding candles, dachshund-shaped paperclips, daisy-shaped dish brushes, Venus flytrap bag clips, mushroom pet bowls, vampire umbrellas, climber-shaped hooks, animal-shaped glasses holders, mini bookshelf stress toys, and floral Band-Aids.

articles.title: Motorola Moto G67 Power launches in India: Snapdragon power, Sony sensor & 7000 mAh battery; Specs & price inside
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Motorola launched the moto g67 POWER smartphone in India, featuring a 50MP Sony LYTIA 600 camera with 4K video recording, a 7000mAh battery, and a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor. The phone is priced at Rs. 15,999 and will be available on Flipkart, Motorola.in, and retail stores starting November 12th, 2025.

articles.title: People Science and Phynova Launch Chloe LiveLab, A New Collaborative Ingredient-Brand Research Model to Generate ...
articles.author: Rio Grande Sun
articles.summary: People Science and Phynova debuted their products at SupplySide Global.

articles.title: Christian Louboutin sparks controversy with new ‘comfy' £745 heels that fashion fans label ‘diabolical granny shoes'
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Christian Louboutin has introduced a new heel design called 'Fannylove,' described as a more comfortable interpretation of the brand's signature pumps with a thicker, block-like heel for everyday wear. The new heels are priced at £745 and are available in matte or patent black.

articles.title: CTV Manufacturers Have New Tool For Catching Spoofed Devices
articles.author: Anthony Vargas
articles.summary: IAB Tech Lab introduced a new device attestation feature for its Open Measurement (OM) SDK. This feature allows device manufacturers to verify the association of ad impressions with genuine devices.

articles.title: 33 Products That Are Basically A Treasure Trove Of Gems
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced firming neck and chest cream to improve skin's firmness, texture, and elasticity. Lottabody launched Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse enriched with coconut and shea oils to create soft wraps, tame frizz, and treat hair. Eos' released Crème de Pistachio Shea Better Body Lotion. Batiste released Sweat Activated Dry Shampoo and TirTir launched Mask Fit AI Filter Cushion Foundation . E.l.f. introduced Hydrating Core Lip Shine in the "Ecstatic" shade. Dr. Melaxin launched "Peel Shot" skincare.

articles.title: WHOTAG, the AI-Powered Influencer Discovery Service, Is Now Launched Globally
articles.author: VAIV Company inc
articles.summary: VAIV, a South Korean AI and big data company, launched WHOTAG, an AI-powered SaaS platform designed for influencer discovery globally. WHOTAG is available to brands and agencies worldwide, providing insights into beauty and lifestyle influencers across any country and language.

articles.title: Northumbrian Water Selects Medallia to Elevate Customer Experience for 4 Million Water Customers
articles.summary: Northumbrian Water integrated Medallia's Experience Cloud platform to power an omnichannel experience program, enhancing customer engagement across various touchpoints. Subsequently, Northumbrian Water implemented Medallia Digital Experience Analytics (DXA), integrating it with the already-in-use Medallia Experience Cloud (MEC) platform to gain deeper insight into its digital customer journeys and further enhance online experiences.

articles.title: Google introduces agentic AI features to search, expanding booking capabilities
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google is introducing new agentic features to AI Mode within Search, enabling users to book wellness, beauty appointments, and event tickets directly. This update expands upon previous agentic capabilities added in August, allowing users to find restaurant reservations based on multiple preferences. AI Mode is now available in over 180 countries and includes features like Canvas for study schedules and Google Lens integration.

articles.title: Kristen Bell's Favorite Powder Face Wash Is TSA-Friendly
articles.author: Kaitlin Marks
articles.summary: Kristen Bell endorses Jaxon Lane Enzyme Powder Face Wash, praising its convenience for travel due to its powder form. She highlights its gentle exfoliating properties, suitability for sensitive skin, and ease of use, noting that it transforms into a creamy foam when mixed with water and contains ingredients like pineapple and papaya enzyme.

articles.title: Nintendo Store App Now Available on iOS and Android
articles.author: Steve Vegvari
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Nintendo Store app on iOS and Android. This new app allows users to browse and purchase games for Nintendo Switch and other systems, receive notifications about sales, and check in at Nintendo events. Additionally, the app will provide news updates and allow users to view their play activity across various Nintendo platforms.

articles.title: Mini Glam™ and Target Launch a Clean Beauty Brand Just for Kids
articles.summary: MGA Entertainment, in collaboration with Target, has launched Mini Glam, a new line of kid-friendly, collectible cosmetics. The collection features a range of shimmer-forward cosmetics in playful packaging, with prices starting at $7.99 and is available exclusively at Target stores nationwide and on target.com.

articles.title: Erretres Revamps Strategic Startup Services to Fuel the Rise of Europe's Next Unicorns
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Erretres, a branding agency, has revamped its strategic startup services. The updated approach aims to bring growth to European startups. This update builds on the firm's original methodology and aligns with client needs in an AI-driven market.

articles.title: Longwood Truck Center Celebrates 21 Years of Serving Florida's Commercial Vehicle Community
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Longwood Truck Center distinguishes itself through professional Box Truck Repairs and customization services performed on-site at their Sanford facility. The company's fabrication department provides complete box truck repair solutions, including wood floor replacement, structural repairs, roll-up door installation and repair, and custom modifications to meet specific business needs. As an authorized dealer for Tommy Gate, Dhollandia, and Maxon hydraulic lift-gates, the dealership maintains over 150 lift gates in stock, all backed by a 2-year warranty.

articles.title: Beauté Test launches Beauty AI Visibility, a new SEO offer in artificial intelligence environments
articles.summary: Beauté Test, a French beauty reference site, launched Beauty AI Visibility, a solution to help brands navigate AI-driven consumer recommendations. The solution includes AI visibility audits, content creation and optimization, multi-channel amplification through Reworld Media's network, and continuous measurement and optimization. This launch aims to help brands thrive in the evolving AI-powered beauty landscape.

articles.title: Best-selling skincare advent calendar worth £935 that fans 'couldn't wait to open' now £89
articles.author: Rachael Davies
articles.summary: Avant Skincare is launching the Wonders Advent Calendar for 2025, featuring £935 worth of skincare products for £99, with a discount code available. The calendar includes award-winning items like the Pro-Intense Hyaluronic Acid Illuminating Day Cream and Damascan Rose Petals Revitalising Facial Serum, and debuts an augmented reality feature. Select calendars contain Golden Tickets offering up to £1,000 worth of Avant Skincare products.

articles.title: Motorola unveils Moto G67 Power with 7,000mAh battery in India
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: Motorola launched a new product on Wednesday, November 5.

articles.title: Quali's Torque Platform Scales NVIDIA DGX Spark for Secure, Orchestrated AI at the Edge
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Quali has integrated its Torque platform with NVIDIA DGX Spark, enabling enterprises to orchestrate and scale AI workloads securely from edge to cloud. Torque transforms DGX Spark into a shared, policy-driven AI infrastructure, allowing teams to manage pipelines, enforce policies, and shift workloads between local and cloud resources, as well as run local inference workflows on DGX Spark.

articles.title: Au Vodka becomes UK's best-selling RTD brand
articles.author: James Beeson
articles.summary: Au Vodka expanded its RTD range with new flavors and formats, including 8% abv canned cocktails in Blue Hawaiian and Strawberry Daiquiri, 7% abv caffeinated cans under a sub-brand called Au Ultra, and an alcohol-free Blue Raspberry variant. The company focuses on continuous innovation by releasing new flavors more frequently, drawing inspiration from soft drink brands like Monster.

articles.title: Nazara Technologies unveils new brand identity to signal global gaming push
articles.summary: Nazara Technologies has launched a new brand identity, featuring a visual of the letter N as a magic wand with three rising stars. This refresh signifies a strategic shift towards building global standard original IP and strengthening live operations as the company evolves into a creator of immersive experiences. The new identity is anchored by the tagline 'Enter. Magic.'

articles.title: Sainsbury's launches half price discount deal for 18 million customers
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Sainsbury's is offering Nectar card holders a 50% discount on a 1L bottle of Baileys Original Irish Cream Liqueur from November 5 to December 3, 2025. Sainsbury's has also reduced the price of Edizione 789 Prosecco 75cl and Newlands Point Sauvignon Blanc White Wine 75cl with Nectar card.

articles.title: Dreame Unveils Premium Aqua & Matrix Robotic Cleaners in Australia and New Zealand  Nov. 5, 2025 12:02
articles.summary: Dreame Technology has launched a new premium lineup of robotic cleaners, including the Aqua10 Ultra Roller, Aqua10 Ultra Track S, and the flagship Matrix10 Ultra, in Australia and New Zealand. The Matrix10 Ultra introduces the world's first Smart Multi-Mop Switching Robot Vacuum with Multi-Mop Switching Dock and a Three-Solution Compartment. These products are available through Dreame's official websites and retailers, with prices ranging from 2,499 AUD to 3,499 AUD.

articles.title: Dreame Unveils Premium Aqua & Matrix Robotic Cleaners in Australia and New Zealand
articles.author: Dreame Technology
articles.summary: Dreame Technology launched a new premium lineup of robotic cleaners in Australia and New Zealand, including the Aqua10 Ultra Roller, Aqua10 Ultra Track S, and the Matrix10 Ultra. The Matrix10 Ultra features a Smart Multi-Mop Switching system, while the Aqua10 Ultra series uses AquaRoll Mopping technology with real-time fresh water delivery.

articles.title: Chloe Hardy and Dupes & Co. take Fifth Avenue by storm
articles.author: UBA Media USA TODAY
articles.summary: Dupes & Co. is expanding its product line with body care, hair mists, and lotions, echoing the signature scents and extending them into a daily ritual. The company is driving discovery in the United States through TikTok Shop and Amazon, focusing on scaling affiliates with smart sampling and nurturing a creator community.

articles.title: Bring Words to Life Using the Seedream 4.0
articles.author: Shiraz Aslam
articles.summary: ByteDance has launched Seedream 4.0, a new AI image generator. This multimodal system allows users to generate 2K-quality images in less than two seconds and supports 4K output, with capabilities encompassing text-to-image, image editing, and reference-based creations.

articles.title: OpenAI's viral ‘Sora' app lands on android - But there's a catch you should know
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched its AI-generated short-form video app, Sora, on Android in seven countries after its initial release on iOS. The app, powered by the Sora 2 model, allows users to create 60-second videos from text or image prompts and offers a free tier with paid upgrades for longer videos and faster generation speeds via OpenAI Plus.

articles.title: Roborock has made an entry-level robot vacuum – and it's a lot cheaper than I expected
articles.author: Lizzie Wilmot
articles.summary: Roborock has launched the Roborock Q7 TF+, a new entry-level robot vacuum cleaner featuring 10,000 Pa suction, dual anti-tangle brushes, carpet detection, and PreciSense LiDAR navigation. The Q7 TF+ is priced at €249 and is currently available in several European countries.

articles.title: Get ZBrush & Adobe Substance 3D Together In One Bundle
articles.author: Amber Rutherford
articles.summary: Maxon and Adobe are offering new bundles. One bundle combines ZBrush and the Adobe Substance 3D collection, which includes 3D Painter, 3D Designer, 3D Sampler, and 3D Stager. Another bundle is Maxon One + Adobe Substance 3D, incorporating Cinema 4D, Red Giant, and Redshift with the full Substance 3D suite.

articles.title: 1 common household item will make your mirror look as good as new
articles.author: Danielle Kate Wroe
articles.summary: Fairy Liquid offers a cleaning solution to achieve streak-free mirrors by cutting through grease and dirt. The demonstration outlines the method with a damp microfibre cloth, applying Fairy Liquid in circular motions, and buffing with a dry cloth. It's designed to lift fingerprints, smudges, and other residues that often build up on glass surfaces and can be easily rinsed off, leaving no film, making mirrors look cloudy.

articles.title: Meta Alumni Develop Voice-Commanded Device for Note-Taking and Music Control
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Sandbar, a startup, has launched Stream, a voice-controlled ring designed for hands-free interaction with AI assistants, note-taking, and media control. Pre-orders for Stream are now open, with prices ranging from $249 to $299, and shipping is expected to begin next summer. The device features integrated microphones, a touch-sensitive pad, and a companion iOS app, with a focus on user privacy and data security.

articles.title: 11 Best New Five Below Items Hitting Shelves This November — Best Life
articles.author: Emily Weaver
articles.summary: Five Below has introduced several new products, including the Lazy Days Lip Balm as a dupe for Summer Fridays' Lip Butter Balm, a Tumbler Spinner Storage for organizing tumblers, and a Wicked Crochet Kit timed with the release of the 'Wicked' movie.  Other new offerings include the Mini Water Dispenser, Dunkin' Box O' Chocolates, Diet Coke Journal, Amora Glow Morning Melon Magic Set, Ceramic Insta Pix Frame, Mailbox Cat Scratcher, Quilted Travel Organizer, and a Wavy Wireless Keyboard.

articles.title: Pantone and Microsoft unite to enhance creative exploration through AI
articles.author: Microsoft Corp.
articles.summary: Pantone launched the beta version of the Pantone Palette Generator, a new tool built using Microsoft Azure OpenAI. This tool brings Pantone's color expertise into Pantone Connect, creating an intelligent, interactive experience for designers. It aims to accelerate design workflows.

articles.title: 'Perfect' £20 gift set for men with five products inside now £7 at Home Bargains
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Home Bargains is offering multiple Nivea skincare gift sets at discounted prices on its website. These include the Nivea Men Take Full Control Skincare Gift Set reduced to £6.99, the Nivea Men Feel Calm All Over Skincare Gift Set reduced to £9.99, and the Nivea Softening Moments Of Joy Gift Set reduced to £3.99.

articles.title: My Favorite Baking Staple Is Only Sold at Sam's Club (and It's a Bargain)
articles.author: Laurel Randolph
articles.summary: Magnolia Star Baking Supply offers Vanilla Bean Paste in an 8-ounce squeeze bottle, priced at $12.98 at Sam's Club. The Nashville-based producer also makes vanilla extract, almond extract, and lemon extract, with cocoa powder and baking mixes on the horizon. Their vanilla extract is also high-quality, and clocks it at under $10 for eight ounces.

articles.title: I found a £5.50 buy perfect for hair growth after years of bald spots
articles.summary: Head & Shoulders launched Hair Revitaliser, a product designed to promote hair growth, containing ingredients like caffeine and niacinamide. The product is available at Amazon for £5.49 and at Boots for £11, including a shampoo and conditioner priced at £6 each.

articles.title: Motorola Moto G67 Power launches in India: Snapdragon power, Sony sensor & 7000 mAh battery; Specs & price
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the moto g64 POWER, a new smartphone, in India. The smartphone features a 50MP Sony LYTIA 600 camera.

articles.title: Exceptional laundry service sent directly to your door
articles.summary: Wilton Green has extended the reach of its door-to-door laundry and dry cleaning service across London and beyond, including areas like St Albans, Hemel Hempstead and Watford. The service offers online and app-based booking, a full range of dry cleaning and laundry services including stain removal, repairs and alterations using state-of-the-art technology, and sustainable practices, making exceptional care accessible to all.

articles.title: 'Tis the season to be sexy! Gwyneth Paltrow's GOOP has Christmas all wrapped up with a $1,300 sex toy advent calendar - featuring bondage rope, gold plated handcuffs and a five speed vibrator
articles.author: JASON CHESTER
articles.summary: Goop, under Gwyneth Paltrow, launched a £1,000 sex toy advent calendar through its lifestyle site featuring items from Kiki de Montparnasse. Goop's holiday lineup also features the new 'Heartthrob Vibrator,' and Dame's new vibrating ring.

articles.title: Windows 11 Store Gets Ninite-Style Multi-App Installer Feature
articles.author: Bleeping Computer
articles.summary: Microsoft Store on the web now offers the functionality to create multi-app install packages on Windows 11. This feature enables users to install multiple applications at once using a single installer.

articles.title: Moto G67 Power 5G Launching in India on Wednesday: Specs, Colours, and Battery Details
articles.author: Varun Keval
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the new Moto G67 Power 5G in India on Wednesday. The phone features a 6.7-inch full-HD+ LCD display, Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, up to 8GB RAM, and a 7,000mAh battery with 30W fast charging and will be available on Flipkart and the Motorola India website.

articles.title: Maïzly Wins GAMA Innovation Award for SMEs, Recognized as the Next Generation of Plant-Based Milk
articles.author: Burlington Times-News
articles.summary: Maïzly launched as the world's first corn milk brand on November 4, 2025, in Cary, N.C.

articles.title: Motorola's Edge 70 Sets the Standard for Next-Generation Slim Smartphones
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Edge 70, an affordable alternative to the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge and iPhone Air, in the UK and Europe for £699/€799. The Edge 70 features a super-slim design, durable silicone build, a 4,800mAh battery, and 68W wired charging, with Motorola including a magnetic plastic case with the phone in EMEA.

articles.title: Motorola is back with new Android phone that beats rivals on features and price
articles.author: Dave Snelling
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Moto Edge 70, a new Android-powered smartphone with a 6.67-inch screen, Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 processor, and a triple-lens AI camera. The phone, priced from £699.99, is designed with aircraft-grade aluminum, Gorilla Glass, and a waterproof case.

articles.title: How Netzone is empowering young Nigerians through Innovation in tech, energy
articles.author: Christiana Njideka
articles.summary: S.Mobile Netzone Ltd is introducing initiatives to empower young Nigerians with digital and entrepreneurial skills. This includes a technology and innovation institute that partners with government agencies and corporate organizations to advance cybersecurity and digital innovation across Africa.

articles.title: GeForce RTX: Powering Creative Workflows & GPUs
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: NVIDIA RTX GPUs and related AI tools, such as TensorRT, are enhancing content creation workflows by accelerating tasks like video editing, 3D modeling, and livestreaming. These advancements unlock new creative possibilities and efficiencies, demonstrated by faster processing times and improved performance across various applications. Moreover, the integration of NVIDIA NeMo microservices with Langflow is democratizing the development and deployment of AI agent workflows.

articles.title: The Motorola Edge 70 is another ridiculously thin smartphone
articles.author: Lawrence Bonk
articles.summary: Motorola has announced the launch of its Edge 70 smartphone, featuring an ultra-thin design, a trio of 50MP camera sensors, and a 4800mAh battery. The Edge 70 starts at £700 (around $910 USD) and is currently available for purchase in the UK.

articles.title: Motorola's new ultra-thin phone is cheaper than Apple and Samsung's
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Motorola Edge 70, an ultra-thin Android phone priced at £699, featuring a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 processor and 12GB RAM. The company also introduced the budget-friendly Moto G57 Power with a 7,000mAh battery for £229.99 and the Moto Buds Bass earbuds priced at £49.99.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 70 review: a big battery makes this ultra-slim phone easier to recommend
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Edge 70, a super-slim mid-range smartphone with a focus on design and battery life. The Edge 70 features a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset, a 6.7-inch P-OLED display, and a 4800mAh battery with 68W wired charging. The phone is priced at £699/€799 and offers a balance of features and performance for its category.

articles.title: ANTHBOT Debuts the Industry's First 4-in-1 Lawn Care Robot, Ushering in a New Era of Smart Lawn Management
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: ANTHBOT has introduced the N Series and M Series of intelligent lawn care robots. The N Series is a 4-in-1 robot for mowing, shredding, clipping collection, and leaf sweeping, while the M Series offers robust performance in a compact design for smaller lawns. Global availability for both series is scheduled to begin in March 2026, with the M Series starting at €699 and the N Series at €1299.

articles.title: ⚡Check Out Moto G67 Power 5G Price, Specifications, Features
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Moto G67 Power 5G, a new mid-range smartphone. The phone features a 7,000mAh battery with 30W fast charging and 4K recording across all cameras.

articles.title: Motorola Launches moto g67 POWER: 50MP Sony LYTIA™ Camera, 7000mAh Battery, 4K Video, Snapdragon® 7s Gen 2, Only Rs. 14,999*
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the moto g67 POWER, a new smartphone featuring a 50MP Sony LYTIA™ 600 camera, a 7000mAh battery, and a Snapdragon® 7s Gen 2 processor. Available in three colors, the phone will be sold on Flipkart, Motorola.in, and in retail stores beginning November 12, 2025, with a launch price of Rs. 15,999 and offers reducing the price to Rs. 14,999.

articles.title: Motorola G67 Power Launched In India: Check Price, Specifications, Colors, Offers And More
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Motorola G67 Power 5G in India. The new smartphone features a 7000 mAh silicon-carbon battery and a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, and it will be sold on Flipkart, Motorola India's site, and offline stores starting November 12. The Motorola G67 Power is priced at Rs 15,999 for the 8GB + 128GB variant.

articles.title: Yeah! Launches an Exciting Trio of Fruit-Infused Milk Flavoured Drinks – A Taste of Joy in Every Sip
articles.author: akintayo eribake
articles.summary: The Yeah brand has launched three new milk yoghurt flavors: Apple, Pineapple, and Orange. These drinks blend yoghurt with fruit flavors, targeting consumers looking for a balance of taste and nutrition. The Yeah Flavoured Milk Drink range is available nationwide in major supermarkets and convenience stores.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Golden's gala raises significant funds for community support
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Snarf's Sandwiches is celebrating National Sandwich Day with a buy-one-get-one free deal at all locations, including Golden. Customers can take advantage of this special offer by following the shop on Instagram.

articles.title: How to Get a Temporary Phone Number for SMS Online Free
articles.author: Press Releases
articles.summary: The article introduces temporary phone numbers as a service for receiving SMS messages or calls without revealing personal information. Services like sms-verification-number.com, 7sim.net, and 24sms7.com are highlighted, offering both free and paid options with varying levels of privacy and reliability for account verification and other applications. The article advises users to use SIM-based numbers for best results and provides a step by step guide to get a temporary number.

articles.title: TVS unveils new Norton bikes: Manx, Manx R, Atlas and Atlas GT launched at EICMA; iconic British brand set for global resurgence
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: TVS Motor Company unveiled four new Norton motorbike models, the Manx and Manx R supersport models. These models were designed under TVS's leadership since acquiring Norton five years ago. Norton, a British brand now has TVS Motor platform for manufacturing and global distribution.

articles.title: Privacy at Home: What Happens When Your Robot Has Eyes and Ears?
articles.author: Cenk Demircan
articles.summary: 1X Technologies is introducing NEO, a $20,000 AI-powered humanoid home assistant robot. This robot is designed to help with daily tasks, respond to voice commands, and navigate autonomously within the home. However, its data collection practices and potential privacy implications are raising concerns.

articles.title: DoubleVerify Introduces DV AI Verification
articles.summary: DoubleVerify has launched DV AI Verification, a new product designed to help advertisers identify and manage AI agent interactions while also avoiding low-quality, AI-generated content. DV AI Verification includes Agent ID Measurement, AI SlopStopper for Open Web, and AI SlopStopper for Social, all key components of DV's Media AdVantage Platform.

articles.title: Akii Launches the World's First Free AI Visibility Score
articles.summary: Akii has launched its AI Visibility Score, a free tool designed to help businesses understand their AI discoverability. This tool provides insights into how AI models like ChatGPT and Gemini perceive and rank brands, enabling businesses to optimize their visibility in the AI-first search era. Akii also offers a premium plan with advanced monitoring capabilities.

articles.title: Dreame Unveils Premium Aqua & Matrix Robotic Cleaners in Australia and New Zealand
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Dreame Technology launched a new premium lineup of robotic cleaners in Australia and New Zealand, which includes the Aqua10 Ultra Roller, Aqua10 Ultra Track S, and Matrix10 Ultra models. The Matrix10 Ultra features a Smart Multi-Mop Switching Robot Vacuum with a Multi-Mop Switching Dock, and it is available along with the Aqua10 series and AU-customised Dreame L50 Ultra through Dreame's official website, Amazon, and retailers.

articles.title: Triton Digital Launches AdBuilder AI To Power Self-Serve Audio Buying
articles.author: Mark K. Miller
articles.summary: Triton Digital has launched AdBuilder AI, a self-serve platform aimed at helping partners increase revenue by attracting small and medium-sized businesses. The platform streamlines workflow, creative development, trafficking, and billing, enabling partners to tap into a new demand stream. AdBuilder AI offers features such as AI-generated audio ads and direct integration with the Triton Ad Platform (TAP).

articles.title: Canon U.S.A. Debuts CR-N400 and CR-N350 PTZ Cameras, Elevating the Art of Professional Video ...
articles.author: Canon U.S.A.
articles.summary: Canon U.S.A., Inc. launched the CR-N400 and CR-N350, which are new Pan-Tilt-Zoom (PTZ) cameras. These cameras are designed to deliver high-quality images and versatile connectivity for various professional video applications. Canon aims to enhance its PTZ camera lineup with the introduction of these new models to address customer needs.

articles.title: Canon U.S.A. Debuts CR-N400 and CR-N350 PTZ Cameras, Elevating the Art of Professional Video Production
articles.author: Canon U.S.A.
articles.summary: Canon U.S.A., Inc. has launched the CR-N400 and CR-N350 PTZ cameras, designed for professional video applications, with features like 4K 60p imaging, 20x optical zoom, and versatile connectivity. The CR-N400 is tailored for professional broadcasters with 12G-SDI connectivity, while the CR-N350 is a cost-effective solution for users needing 4K over HDMI/IP. Availability is scheduled for late December 2025, with estimated retail prices of $5,699.00 and $3,999.00, respectively.

articles.title: Daily Success Media Network partners with XPR Media and USA Today Network to launch the first AI-engineered media distribution service
articles.author: pressadvantage
articles.summary: Daily Success Media Network, in partnership with XPR Media and the USA Today Network, has launched a new AI-engineered media distribution service. This service enables users to distribute stories to over 200 media outlets while optimizing visibility across AI search engines, aiming to enhance reputation, ranking, and relevance.

articles.title: Euphoria Powder By Professor Whyte's: Trending Among Wellness Fans
articles.author: rctadmin
articles.summary: Professor Whyte's introduced Euphoria Powder, which is praised for its quality, texture, and consistency, becoming a favorite among wellness enthusiasts. The brand focuses on selecting only premium-grade kratom to ensure purity, consistency, and freshness. The product's reliable consistency fosters trust among customers and confidence for retailers.

articles.title: Redmi Turbo 5 Gets 3C Certification; Launch Near with Dimensity 8500 and 9,000mAh+ Battery
articles.author: udaipurkiranad
articles.summary: Redmi is preparing to launch the Redmi Turbo 5 smartphone in China, potentially the first device powered by MediaTek's Dimensity 8500 SoC. The phone is expected to feature a 1.5K OLED display, Android 16 with HyperOS 3, a 9,000mAh+ battery with 100W charging, and may be rebranded as the Poco X8 Pro globally.

articles.title: Best Early Black Friday Deals 2025: A Complete Guide
articles.author: Nick Hall
articles.summary: Happy Nuts is offering 40% off its Holiday Boxes, which include grooming essentials. Sennheiser will likely offer discounts on ACCENTUM Plus Wireless Headphones. Retailers will likely offer discounts on Lavazza A Modo Mio Jolie Coffee Machine.

articles.title: Azizi Developments Launches Azizi Gabriel in Dubai's Downtown Jebel Ali
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Azizi Developments launched Azizi, indicating a new real estate offering or project from the company.

articles.title: Samsung Experience: Your Digital Journey Begins Here
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Samsung enhances digital life with a comprehensive ecosystem, including Galaxy smartphones, wearables, tablets, Smart TVs, and smart home appliances. Samsung is also focusing on enhancing its smart home capabilities and creating more seamless integration between devices with SmartThings platform. The company commits to software updates, ensuring security and long-term support.

articles.title: Steam／Epic Games Store版「FINAL FANTASY VII REBIRTH」Version1.004のアップデートが配信
articles.summary: FINAL FANTASY VII REBIRTH is set to be released on Steam and Epic Games Store. This marks the introduction of the game on these new platforms.

articles.title: ‘It's a game-changer': Fonterra cream wins big at NZ Food Awards
articles.author: The Country
articles.summary: Fonterra launched Anchor Easy Bakery Cream, a UHT cream with lower fat content and New Zealand milk provenance, at the China International Import Expo in November. The product aims to meet the demands of professional bakers and chefs while being more affordable. Initial response and customer acquisition have been positive, contributing to Fonterra's foodservice business growth in China.

articles.title: DoubleVerify launches AI verification solution to help advertisers manage AI content
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: DoubleVerify (DV) has introduced DV AI Verification™, a new product designed to help advertisers identify and manage AI agent interactions and avoid low-quality AI-generated content. The product includes Agent ID Measurement for identifying AI-powered chatbot engagement and AI SlopStopper™ for avoiding low-quality AI-generated content across the Open Web and social media platforms.

articles.title: Y8 Launches New Modern UI for Smarter Game Discovery and Competitive Play
articles.summary: Y8 has launched a new user interface for its browser-gaming platform. This update focuses on delivering a faster, more streamlined experience with cleaner navigation and device-friendly responsiveness. The redesign aims to modernize browser gameplay and improve game discovery.

articles.title: These gorgeous Nike hybrid sneakers are bringing back two classics in one incredible design
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Nike is launching two new colorways for its Air Max Waffle shoes on October 5th at 10 a.m. ET for $145 each. These new designs, available in Sail and Neutral Grey or Matte Olive and Legion Brown, merge the Air Max Plus midsole with the Waffle Trainer outsole.

articles.title: Best Buy Canada Black Friday: TVs, Vacuums & More!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Dyson's latest cordless vacuum models boast powerful suction and 70-minute runtimes, marking a significant advancement in domestic technology. These advancements integrate AI algorithms, enabling vacuums to learn from the environment and adapt to cleaning needs. The trend leads to predictive cleaning systems, utilizing data to schedule tasks and proactively maintain homes.

articles.title: 28 Products To Help Clean And Organize Your Messy Home
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of cleaning and organizing products. These products include The Pink Stuff cleaner, Dawn Powerwash dish spray, Wet & Forget shower cleaner, and rust stain remover spray. There are also organizers for cutlery, bottles, stuffed animals, makeup, and containers to keep homes tidy.

articles.title: Cinnabon UAE Unveils The Matcha Collection – A Fusion of Iconic Flavors Perfectly Complementing Their Signature Rolls
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Cinnabon UAE launched The Matcha Collection, a new line of beverages.

articles.title: Bonat Secures $6M Series A to Expand Across GCC
articles.summary: Bonat, an AI-powered customer engagement platform, secured $6 million in Series A funding to deepen its AI capabilities and roll out personalized campaign automation. The company plans to expand across Saudi Arabia and the wider GCC and will integrate payments and mobile wallets so merchants can manage the full customer journey from a single dashboard.

articles.title: Motorola Moto G67 Power launches in India: Snapdragon power, Sony sensor & 7000 mAh battery; ...
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the moto g67 POWER in India, a new smartphone model priced under Rs. 15,000. The phone features a 50MP Sony LYTIA 600 camera.

articles.title: Motorola's iPhone Air rival brings a bigger battery, faster charging, and a much better price ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Motorola released the Edge 70, a super-slim and affordable smartphone.

articles.title: NIO Inc. Delivers a Record 40,397 Vehicles in October (Nio Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: NIO delivered 40,397 vehicles in October 2025. This includes 17,143 NIO branded vehicles, 17,342 ONVO vehicles, and 5,912 vehicles from another sub-brand. The total deliveries represent a 92.6% increase year-over-year, demonstrating strong performance of NIO's product lineup.

articles.title: This AI smart ring lets you record voice notes with a whisper
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Sandbar, founded by former CTRL-Labs employees, is launching a new AI-powered wearable called the Stream Ring. Users can now preorder the smart ring.

articles.title: Instacart Announces New Enterprise AI Solutions to Democratize AI for Grocers of All Sizes
articles.author: Rio Grande Sun
articles.summary: Kroger, Sprouts Farmers Market, and Good Food Holdings are among the retailers launching 'AI Solutions'. This introduction signifies the adoption of AI Solutions by these companies.

articles.title: Pantone and Microsoft unite to enhance creative exploration through AI
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Pantone and Microsoft launched Pantone Palette Generator, a new product built on Microsoft Azure OpenAI. The product accelerates design workflows within Pantone Connect.

articles.title: Xpeng Debuts Humanoid Robot With Synthetic Skin, Custom Body, And 2026 Release Date
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: Xpeng unveiled its latest generation of humanoid robots featuring synthetic skin and customizable features during its AI Day keynote address. This launch signifies Xpeng's expansion into the robotics sector.

articles.title: Craig Group Expands Conduit™: Board-Ready Scenario Planning, On Demand
articles.author: The Galveston Daily News
articles.summary: Conduit launched its strategic GTM scenario planning service for the middle market after a successful launch. The service moves beyond forecasting.

articles.title: Australia Is Facing An 'AI Divide', New National Survey Shows
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: OpenAI launched ChatGPT in November 2022. This launch introduced a generative artificial intelligence product to the public.

articles.title: Good Hair Day, Every Day: Laifen officially arrives in the Philippines, setting a new standard for smart hair drying
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Laifen is introducing next-generation haircare.

articles.title: Lava Agni 4 Launching This Month In India: 5 Key Things You Should Know
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Lava is launching the Agni 4, a premium device, in the Indian market this month. The Agni 4's introduction constitutes a new product offering from Lava.

articles.title: The Nintendo Store finally has an app, and it's hiding a long-requested feature
articles.author: Polygon
articles.summary: Nintendo launched an official Nintendo Store app on mobile devices. The app enables players to shop for games.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 70 Is Ultrathin in Design, but Super Big on Battery
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: A new phone features a battery capacity exceeding that of the iPhone Air and Galaxy S25 Edge. This enhanced battery performance is a key feature of the new device.

articles.title: Nintendo Store app available now on Android and iOS outside of Japan
articles.author: Shacknews
articles.summary: The Nintendo app allows users to access the digital Nintendo store. Users can purchase games and apps through the app. It enables users to queue purchased content for download to connected devices.

articles.title: Northumbrian Water Selects Medallia to Elevate Customer Experience for 4 Million Water Customers
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Northumbrian Water selected Medallia to improve the customer experience for its 4 million water customers. The selection implies Medallia providing its customer experience platform as a service to Northumbrian Water.

articles.title: OpenAI launches Sora app for Android
articles.author: Arabian Business
articles.summary: An AI-powered video creation tool is now available on Android devices. This tool has the potential to go viral. The availability is currently limited to select markets.

articles.title: Hanes $10 Sweatpants Are up to 60% Off at Amazon and Walmart — ‘Comfortable and Lightweight'
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Amazon offers comfortable and lightweight sweatpants.

articles.title: Motorola G67 Power 5G smartphone launched in India: Here's everything you need to know
articles.author: Live Mint
articles.summary: Motorola launched its G67 Power 5G smartphone in India on Wednesday. The launch included details regarding the features and pricing of the new handset.
